title: Gal Gadot’s Surprise Dinner For Ali Fazal, Gully Boy Wins Best Film Award & More From Ent
text:
Actor Ali Fazal's birthday turned into a really special one for reasons more than one. The who is currently busy shooting in London for his international project 'The Death On The Nile', has received a special surprise on his birthday from co-stars Gal Gadot and Annette Bening.

2. Ranveer Singh & Alia Bhatt’s Gully Boy Wins Best Film Honour At Asian Academy Creative Awards

Farhan Akhtar expressed happiness over the victory and congratulated the entire team in a tweet. "Gully Boy wins the best film from India in the regional finals of the Asian Academy Creative Awards. Congratulations team," he wrote.

3. Third Crorepati Of KBC 11, Gautam Kumar Jha Wants To Build A Home In Patna With His Prize Money

Don't Miss 388 SHARES 129 SHARES 103 SHARES

In this season of KBC, two people have won one crore rupees already. The third one to join the bandwagon is West Bengal’s Gautam Kumar Jha, a senior section engineer in Indian Railways.

4. Joaquin Phoenix Describes The 'Heartbreaker' Scene From Joker That You’ll Never Ever Get To See

“There was a scene that, that during the shoot we thought was one of the best scenes and we loved his behavior in the scene, and I’d always really liked the scene. And Todd told me and said, ‘We’re cutting that scene out.’ And at first I thought, like, ‘Wait a minute, what do you mean you cut that scene out?’ And then of course I saw it, and it was very obvious. It has to go.”

5. Science Says Bella Hadid Is World’s Most Beautiful Woman & Her Features Are Close To Perfection

Her face, scientists say is close to perfection. Her face is 94.35 per cent perfect, according to Golden Ratio of Beauty Phi parameters, which define beauty in accordance with the Greek calculations.
description: From Gal Gadot’s surprise dinner treat for Ali Fazal to Gully Boy winning the best film award at Asian Academy Creative Awards, here is all that rocked the world of entertainment today. The Zoya Akhtar directorial has just bagged the best film from India award in the regional finals at the Asian Academy Creative Awards ceremony.
